trans-unit.source: Notify me of new comments by e-mail
trans-unit.target: Ziņot man par jauniem komentāriem ar e-pastu

trans-unit.source: You need to be logged in to add comments.
trans-unit.target: Jums jābūt reģistrētam, lai pievienotu komentāru.

trans-unit.source:
%s has created a new comment on your website.
---
%s
---
View: %s Edit: %s
If you are moderating comments, you have to log in to the back end to publish it.
Your comment has been added and is now pending for approval.
trans-unit.target: Jūsu komentārs ir pievienots un šobrīd gaida apstiprinājumu.

trans-unit.source:
Hello %s,
please confirm that you want to be notified of new comments by e-mail on this page:
%s
---
Confirm: %s Cancel: %s
trans-unit.target:
Labdien %s,
Lūdzu, apstipriniet, ka vēlaties saņemt paziņojumus par jauniem komentāriem šajā lapā pa e-pastu:
%s
---
Apstiprināt: %s Atcelt: %s

trans-unit.source: A new comment has been added on %s

Hello %s,
a new comment has been added on a page you have subscribed to:
%s
---
To cancel your subscription, please click here: %s
trans-unit.target:
Labdien %s,
lapā, kuru esat abonējis, ir pievienots jauns komentārs:
%s
---
Lai atceltu abonementu, lūdzu, noklikšķiniet šeit: %s
